_xResult.title: Easy Squeeze Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cotton jacket with belt
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made open-front jacket is exactly the coat the you’ve been looking for. The cotton is given a worn look, making this made to measure piece look even more comfy, cozy and luxurious. If you feel like holding it closed, this jacket comes with a belt you can secure in the front. Keep this baby hanging by the door to make passersbys jealous when you leave the house—even if it’s just to walk the dogs!

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
